text: allah tan elu vanankalaiyum innum pumiyiliruntu avarraip polavum pataittan, niccamayaka allah ellap porutkal mitum caktiyutaiyavan enpataiyum, melum niccayamaka allah tan nanattal ellap porulaiyum culntarikiran enpataiyum ninkal arintu kolvatarkaka, avarrin (vanankal, pumiyin) itaiye avan kattalaiyirankik konteyirukkiratu
